DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost 0.01% in subjects with elevated intraocular pressure (IOP) due to primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG) or ocular hypertension (OH).
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Bimatoprost 0.01% in Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OH)
DOC.criteria: Elevated IOP due to either primary openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
